message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. This offer leaves us both with something.
I understand you wanting more, Alice, but my turn now. Let's make a deal!
Time is running out, Bob. This is a better deal than the next one you'll offer!
This is a fair offer, Alice. We both lose if this keeps going.
Okay, Bob, let's try this again.  This is a fair deal considering the circumstances.
Alice, let's be real. This is the only fair deal. Take it or leave it.
